value.title: DAX Fridays! #44: CROSSFILTER
value.excerpt: IN todays video, we will go trough an example on how crossfilter works. Crossfilter can simulate relationships and active and deactivate them as you need to. value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE
